sentences.en: A hero risks his life to help others; a craven runs from the scene.
sentences.cn: 英雄冒着生命危险区帮助别人; 而懦夫却临阵脱逃.

sentences.en: Careful self - love is goodness originally, but if beyond the mark, become craven incapacity.
sentences.cn: 谨慎自爱本是美德, 但是倘若过分, 就变成畏缩无能.

sentences.en: Do you want to know you are warrior, wisdom or a craven one?
sentences.cn: 想知道自己是勇士 、 智者还是懦夫 吗 ?

sentences.en: Earlier this season, Liverpool lost 3 - 1 at Craven Cottage.
sentences.cn: 在赛季之初, 利物浦在克拉文农场球场以1-3负于了富勒姆.

sentences.en: Fayed's aim, it was thought, was to turn Craven Cottage's creaking stands into pricey riverside flats.
sentences.cn: 法耶德的目标, 它被认为是价格昂贵的河岸变成单位克雷文平房的吱吱作响的立场.

sentences.en: He had a craven fear of flying.
He is on - loan at Craven Cottage for the remainder of the season.
sentences.cn: 本赛季余下的日子,布里奇将继续被格拉文农场租借.

sentences.en: I had no doubt that the craven fellow would be only too pleased to back out.
sentences.cn: 我毫不怀疑那个胆小的家伙巴不得撒手退出呢.

sentences.en: Mr. Craven won't permit you to wander or go poking about the house.
sentences.cn: 克瑞温先生是不会允许你在屋子内闲逛或乱翻东西的.

sentences.en: The craven fellow turned and ran.
The particularly craven hackers, phishing fraudsters and malware writers ply the trade for cash, not kicks.
sentences.cn: 特别胆小的黑客 、 钓鱼诈骗和恶意软件写手通过病毒套取现金而不是击溃电脑.

sentences.en: This was after winning two prizes in Craven - A national photography competition.
sentences.cn: 这是获胜后的两个奖项,在文 - 全国摄影比赛.

sentences.en: When she died, it made Mr. Craven hate his life even more than before.
sentences.cn: 她的死使得克瑞温先生更加厌恶生活.

trans.tran_cn: 懦夫, 胆小鬼, 怯懦者
